name: AInimal Kingdom
description:
Controls:

WASD to move. 
Left clicking on an animal will focus on it. 
Press escape to access the pause menu.

Description:

AInimal Kingdom is both a prototype of a teaching tool that one could use to help describe to someone how artificial intelligence works within games and the final project for the university course I completed in 2020, which I will proudly say received a final mark of 92%.

This version of the prototype has updated art and massaged controls for the camera but is otherwise untouched from what it was prior.
